description: An object describing the vessels primary dimensions and statistics.
title: design

timestamp.description: timestamp of the last update to this data

name.description: The common name of the sensor

displacement.description: The datamodel definition of the sensor data. FIXME - need to create a definitions lib of sensor datamodel types

draft.description: From waterline to bottom of keel in meters

canoeDraft.description: From waterline to bottom of canoe hull in meters, eg without keel

loa.description: Length over all in meters (includes spars, bow pulpits etc.)

loh.description: Length over the hull in meters  (not including spars, bow pulpits etc.)

sailArea.description: Sail area in square meters (total sail area which includes all the fore-triangle, the main, and other normal sails present {like half the area of mizzens on ketches and yawls and all the foresail area on schooners}.  It does not include stay sails nor does it include spinnakers and jibs in the fore triangle.)

airHeight.description: Total height of the vessel in meters
